p: The HI in 2015 was high for both insect vectors, 11.8% for Ae. aegypti and 8.1% for Ae. albopictus. March was considered a month of heavy rainfall, as is expected during summer, with a total of 16 rainy days and the accumulated rainfall of 227 mm. In June, there were only three peaks of rainfall above 28 mm, with a total of 169 mm ( Figure 2).
